name: mastering_assistant
description: Analyze a mix and apply loudness normalization with optional soft limiting. Outputs a mastered audio file with consistent loudness targeting a specified LUFS level.

target_lufs.description: Target integrated loudness in LUFS (default: -14). Streaming: -14, CD: -9, broadcast: -23.

apply_limiter.description: Apply soft limiter to prevent clipping (default: true).

ceiling_db.description: Limiter ceiling in dBFS (default: -1.0). Peak level will not exceed this.
